How to Fold a Pocket Square: Square Fold

Bow ties are great for formal occasions and for black tie dress code, but also to show your personality. We have the biggest selection of pre-tied bow ties, slim bow ties, diamond tip bow ties, black bow ties, white bow ties and so much more. Follow these steps to learn how to wear a pre-tied bow tie.
